#summary Threshold for low healing amount.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Percentage of marine's health to stop healing the amount set in [asw_marine_health_regen_amount] and start healing the amount set in [asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low].

Default value is 20%. Set to 0 to disable.
